agreement.header.subtitle: BIC Intelligence Smart Q&A Assistant
agreement.header.title: BIC-QA User Agreement
agreement.meta.title: User Agreement - BIC-QA
agreement.section1.content:
Welcome to the BIC-QA Intelligent Q&A Assistant (the "Service"). This User Agreement (the "Agreement") is concluded between you and BIC Intelligence ("we", "us").

Please read the entire Agreement carefully. If you disagree with any clause, you may choose not to use the Service. Your continued use of the Service constitutes your acceptance of all provisions of this Agreement.
agreement.section1.title: 1. Overview
agreement.section10.content:
This Agreement takes effect when you start using the Service and remains effective until the Service is terminated.

Last Updated: August 1, 2025
agreement.section10.title: 10. Effective Date
agreement.section2.content:
BIC-QA is an intelligent Q&A assistant powered by artificial intelligence, offering the following core features:

  • Smart Q&A: Generate answers using large language models.
  • Knowledge-base search: Retrieve answers from multiple knowledge bases.
  • Page summarization: Produce summaries for web content automatically.
  • Text translation: Support multilingual translation.
  • History management: Save and review your Q&A history.
agreement.section2.title: 2. Service Scope
agreement.section3.content:
3.1 User Rights

  • Access and use all available features of the Service.
  • Receive timely and accurate technical support.
  • Provide feedback and suggestions about the Service.
  • Export personal data when the Service is terminated.

3.2 User Obligations

  • Comply with applicable laws and regulations of the People‚Äôs Republic of China.
  • Refrain from using the Service for unlawful or prohibited activities.
  • Do not attack or damage the Service infrastructure.
  • Safeguard your account credentials.
  • Avoid distributing illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise inappropriate content.
agreement.section3.title: 3. User Rights and Obligations
agreement.section4.content:
The Service and its related technologies, software, algorithms, and interface designs are protected by intellectual property laws. Without our prior written consent, you may not:

  • Copy, modify, or distribute the Service‚Äôs source code.
  • Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Service.
  • Remove or alter copyright notices.
  • Use the Service for commercial purposes unless authorized.
agreement.section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
agreement.section5.content:
We value your privacy. For details, please refer to the Privacy Policy. We undertake to:

  • Collect, use, and protect personal information in accordance with the law.
  • Never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.
  • Apply industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
  • Seek your explicit consent when necessary.
agreement.section5.title: 5. Privacy Protection
agreement.section6.content: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of the Service.
agreement.section6.highlight:
Important Notice: Because the Service is powered by AI, it has the following limitations:

  • Responses may contain inaccuracies or outdated information.
  • The Service does not replace professional advice in fields such as medicine, law, or finance.
  • Output may include bias or inappropriate content.
  • The Service may be temporarily unavailable due to technical reasons.
agreement.section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
agreement.section7.content:
We reserve the right to:

  • Modify or discontinue the Service at any time.
  • Update this Agreement.
  • Restrict or suspend accounts that violate the Agreement.

We will notify users in advance of major changes or termination and assist you in exporting relevant data.
agreement.section7.title: 7. Changes and Termination
agreement.section8.content: This Agreement is governed by the laws of the People‚Äôs Republic of China. Any disputes shall first be resolved through amicable consultation. If consultation fails, either party may bring the dispute before the competent court where BIC Intelligence is located.
agreement.section8.title: 8. Dispute Resolution
agreement.section9.content:
If you have questions or suggestions regarding this Agreement, please contact us:

  • Website: https://www.dbaiops.com/
  • Customer Support: 400 880 0486
  • Address: Suite 516, Tower E1, Yuanchengxin Building, 12 Yumin Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
agreement.section9.title: 9. Contact Us

Before using this SQL optimization service, please read and understand the following disclaimer carefully. By using this service, you agree to comply with all terms of this disclaimer.

This SQL optimization service is an auxiliary optimization tool based on artificial intelligence and data analysis technology. The optimization suggestions, solutions, or conclusions provided are for reference only and do not constitute any form of professional commitment or guarantee, nor can they replace manual professional judgment.

The SQL statements and related database performance data you upload are only used for this SQL optimization task. After the task is completed, the system will automatically clear the relevant data. We promise not to retain any copies, nor to use the data for any other purposes except this optimization.

Optimization results are completely generated based on the SQL statements and data you submit, affected by factors such as database type, index configuration, and data volume. Optimization suggestions may have errors or limitations. You should use the optimization results prudently based on the actual database environment and professional technical judgment. We do not assume any responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or applicability of the optimization results.

We reserve the right to suspend or interrupt the service due to system maintenance, upgrades, security, or other necessary reasons, and will try to notify in advance. We do not assume any responsibility for any service unavailability or data delay that may result.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, we do not assume any responsibility for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages caused by the use of this service, including but not limited to data loss, business interruption, and profit loss.

If you cannot accept any of the above terms, please do not use this service. Once you upload data and start optimization, it is deemed that you have read, understood, and agreed to all contents of this disclaimer.
For more information, please contact the BIC customer service team.
popup.policy.sqlOptimization.security.ht: Data Security Commitment

BIC attaches great importance to user data security and privacy protection, and is committed to safeguarding the security of your SQL statements and database performance data throughout the service process.
Data Privacy Protection

The SQL statements and related database performance data you upload are only used for this SQL optimization task. After the task is completed, the system will immediately delete the original data. BIC solemnly promises:
Not retain any form of original data copies;
Will not disclose, share, or sell user data to any third parties;
Will not use the data for any purposes other than this optimization;
Strictly comply with national and industry-related data protection laws and regulations.
Data Transmission Security
All data adopts high-strength encryption technology (such as TLS/SSL) during upload and transmission to ensure the security and confidentiality of data during network transmission.
Sensitive Data Processing Suggestions
Important Note: If your SQL statements contain core business information, sensitive configurations, or personal information, BIC strongly recommends that you:
Prioritize the use of commercial or privatized deployment services instead of public cloud versions;
Perform desensitization processing on sensitive information (such as table names, field names, specific values, etc.) before submission;
Only upload the necessary SQL statements required for optimization, avoiding unnecessary sensitive information.
Data Storage and Retention

After the optimization task is completed, the system will automatically and permanently delete the original SQL statements and performance data you uploaded. For service improvement purposes, we may retain anonymized analysis results that do not contain any user identity or sensitive information. Such data cannot be associated with specific users or systems.
User Responsibility

Users must ensure that the uploaded data content does not violate any laws and regulations, and does not infringe on the legitimate rights and interests of any third parties. Users shall be fully responsible for the content of their uploaded data.
We always prioritize data security and suggest that you choose the appropriate service version and data preprocessing carefully based on the sensitivity of your data.
For more information, please contact the BIC customer service team.

popup.awr.form.uploadHelpTooltip:
Upload Guidance

‚úÖ Supported Report Types

Standard AWR reports for Oracle single-instance databases (generated via awrrpt.sql or awrrpti.sql).

Commands to generate AWR reports:

  1. Single Instance:
    SQL> @?/rdbms/admin/awrrpt.sql
  2. RAC Single Instance:
    SQL> @?/rdbms/admin/awrrpti.sql

popup.meta.title: BIC-QA - BIC Intelligent Q&A Assistant
popup.policy.disclaimer.content:
Important Notice: Please read this disclaimer carefully before using the BIC-QA AWR analysis service.

  1. Service Nature

    The BIC-QA AWR analysis service is an AI-assisted tool. The analysis results are for reference only and do not constitute professional advice or guarantees of any kind.

  2. Data Usage

    Your uploaded AWR report is used solely for this analysis task. The system automatically deletes the report after completion. BIC will not retain any copies of the report nor use it for any purpose beyond this analysis.

  3. Analysis Results

    The analysis results are generated based on the uploaded AWR report and may contain inaccuracies or be incomplete. Users should apply professional judgment when using the results. BIC assumes no responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of the analysis outcomes.

  4. Service Interruptions

    BIC reserves the right to suspend or interrupt the service for maintenance, upgrades, or other reasons and is not liable for any resulting losses.

  5. Limitation of Liability

    To the maximum extent permitted by law, BIC is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of this service.

By using this service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the above disclaimer.
popup.policy.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
popup.policy.security.content:
Data Security Commitment: BIC places the highest priority on safeguarding user data security and privacy.

1. Data Privacy Protection

Your uploaded AWR report is used exclusively for this analysis task and is automatically deleted once the task is completed. BIC guarantees that it:

  • Does not retain any copies of the report;
  • Does not disclose, share, or sell user data to third parties;
  • Does not use the report for any purpose other than this analysis;
  • Strictly complies with applicable data protection laws and regulations.

2. Data Transmission Security

All data transmissions are encrypted to ensure security throughout the transfer process.

3. Sensitive Data Recommendations

Important: For AWR reports containing sensitive data, BIC strongly recommends that you:

  • Use the commercial edition instead of the public cloud version;
  • Mask or anonymize sensitive information before submission;
  • Upload only the data required for analysis and avoid excessive sensitive content.

4. Data Storage

The system automatically deletes uploaded AWR report files once the analysis is complete. Analysis results (excluding the original report) may be retained to improve services, but they will not contain any information that can identify individual users.

5. User Responsibility

Users must ensure that the uploaded AWR reports do not violate laws, regulations, or infringe upon the rights of others. Users bear full responsibility for the content they submit.

We are committed to safeguarding your data, but we encourage you to assess data sensitivity before use and select a more secure service option when necessary.
popup.policy.security.title: Security Statement
popup.policy.inspection.disclaimer.conte:
Disclaimer

Important Notice: Please read and understand the following disclaimer terms before using this inspection diagnosis service. By using this service, you agree to comply with all contents of this statement.

Service Nature

This inspection diagnosis service is an auxiliary diagnostic tool based on artificial intelligence and data analysis technology. The analysis results, suggestions, or conclusions provided are for reference only and do not constitute any form of professional commitment or guarantee, nor can they replace professional human judgment.

Data Usage and Privacy

The database and operating system performance monitoring data you upload will only be used for this inspection diagnosis task. After the task is completed, the system will automatically clear the relevant data. We promise not to retain any copies and will not use the data for any purpose other than this diagnosis.

Diagnosis Results

Diagnosis results are generated entirely based on the data you submit. Affected by factors such as data integrity and system environment, the analysis conclusions may have errors or limitations. You should use the diagnosis results prudently based on the actual system status and professional technical judgment. We do not assume any responsibility for their accuracy, completeness, or applicability.

Service Availability

We reserve the right to suspend or interrupt the service due to system maintenance, upgrades, security, or other necessary reasons, and will try our best to notify in advance. However, we do not assume any responsibility for service unavailability or data delays that may result from this.

Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, we do not assume responsibility for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential losses caused by using this service, including but not limited to data loss, business interruption, profit loss, etc.

If you cannot accept any of the above terms, please do not use this service. Once you upload data and start the diagnosis, it is deemed that you have read, understood, and agreed to all contents of this disclaimer.
popup.policy.inspection.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
popup.policy.inspection.security.content:
Data Security Commitment

BIC places the highest priority on user data security and privacy protection, and is committed to ensuring the security of your database and operating system performance data throughout the entire service process.

Data Privacy Protection

Your uploaded database and operating system performance monitoring data will only be used for this inspection diagnosis task. Once the task is completed, the system will immediately delete the original data. BIC solemnly promises:

  • Does not retain any copies of the original data in any form;
  • Will not disclose, share, or sell user data to any third party;
  • Will not use the data for any purpose other than this diagnosis;
  • Strictly complies with national and industry-related data protection laws and regulations.

Data Transmission Security

All data is encrypted using high-strength encryption technology (such as TLS/SSL) during upload and transmission, ensuring the security and confidentiality of data during network transmission.

Sensitive Data Processing Recommendations

Important Notice: If your performance data contains core business information, sensitive configurations, or personal information, BIC strongly recommends that you:

  • Prioritize using commercial edition or private deployment services instead of the public cloud version;
  • Mask or anonymize sensitive information (such as IP addresses, hostnames, usernames, table names, etc.) before submission;
  • Upload only the minimum dataset necessary for diagnosis, avoiding non-essential sensitive information.

Data Storage and Retention

Once the diagnosis task is completed, the system will automatically and permanently delete the original performance data you uploaded. For service improvement purposes, we may retain anonymized analysis results that do not contain any user identity or sensitive information. Such data cannot be associated with specific users or systems.

User Responsibility

Users must ensure that the uploaded data content does not violate any laws or regulations and does not infringe upon the legitimate rights and interests of any third party. Users bear full responsibility for the data content they upload.

We always place data security first and recommend that you carefully select appropriate service versions and data preprocessing methods based on the sensitivity of your data.
popup.policy.inspection.security.title: Security Statement

This inspection diagnosis service is an auxiliary diagnostic tool based on artificial intelligence and data analysis technology. The analysis results, suggestions, or conclusions provided are for reference only and do not constitute any form of professional commitment or guarantee, nor can they replace professional human judgment.

The database and operating system performance monitoring data you upload will only be used for this inspection diagnosis task. After the task is completed, the system will automatically clear the relevant data. We promise not to retain any copies and will not use the data for any purpose other than this diagnosis.

Diagnosis results are generated entirely based on the data you submit. Affected by factors such as data integrity and system environment, the analysis conclusions may have errors or limitations. You should use the diagnosis results prudently based on the actual system status and professional technical judgment. We do not assume any responsibility for their accuracy, completeness, or applicability.

We reserve the right to suspend or interrupt the service due to system maintenance, upgrades, security, or other necessary reasons, and will try our best to notify in advance. However, we do not assume any responsibility for service unavailability or data delays that may result from this.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, we do not assume responsibility for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential losses caused by using this service, including but not limited to data loss, business interruption, profit loss, etc.

If you cannot accept any of the above terms, please do not use this service. Once you upload data and start the diagnosis, it is deemed that you have read, understood, and agreed to all contents of this disclaimer.
For further information, please contact the BIC customer service team.
popup.policy.inspection.security.html.in: BIC places the highest priority on user data security and privacy protection, and is committed to ensuring the security of your database and operating system performance data throughout the entire service process.
popup.policy.inspection.security.html.se: Your uploaded database and operating system performance monitoring data will only be used for this inspection diagnosis task. Once the task is completed, the system will immediately delete the original data. BIC solemnly promises:
Does not retain any copies of the original data in any form;
Will not disclose, share, or sell user data to any third party;
Will not use the data for any purpose other than this diagnosis;
Strictly complies with national and industry-related data protection laws and regulations.
All data is encrypted using high-strength encryption technology (such as TLS/SSL) during upload and transmission, ensuring the security and confidentiality of data during network transmission.
Important Notice: If your performance data contains core business information, sensitive configurations, or personal information, BIC strongly recommends that you:
Prioritize using commercial edition or private deployment services instead of the public cloud version;
Mask or anonymize sensitive information (such as IP addresses, hostnames, usernames, table names, etc.) before submission;
Upload only the minimum dataset necessary for diagnosis, avoiding non-essential sensitive information.

Once the diagnosis task is completed, the system will automatically and permanently delete the original performance data you uploaded. For service improvement purposes, we may retain anonymized analysis results that do not contain any user identity or sensitive information. Such data cannot be associated with specific users or systems.

Users must ensure that the uploaded data content does not violate any laws or regulations and does not infringe upon the legitimate rights and interests of any third party. Users bear full responsibility for the data content they upload.
We always place data security first and recommend that you carefully select appropriate service versions and data preprocessing methods based on the sensitivity of your data.
popup.policy.inspection.security.html.fo: For further information, please contact the BIC customer service team.

privacy.header.subtitle: BIC Intelligence Smart Q&A Assistant
privacy.header.title: BIC-QA Privacy Policy
privacy.meta.title: Privacy Policy - BIC-QA
privacy.section1.content:
BIC Intelligence ("we", "our") takes your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy (the "Policy") explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

Please read the Policy carefully. If you disagree with any part, you may choose not to use our services. Your continued use of the services constitutes your acceptance of this Policy.
privacy.section1.title: 1. Overview
privacy.section10.content:
If you have any questions, suggestions, or complaints regarding this Policy, please contact us:

  • Customer Support: 400 880 0486
  • Website: https://www.dbaiops.com/
  • Address: Suite 516, Tower E1, Yuanchengxin Building, 12 Yumin Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing

We will respond within 15 business days after receiving your request.
privacy.section10.title: 10. Contact Us
privacy.section11.content:
This Policy takes effect on the date of publication.

Last Updated: August 1, 2025
privacy.section11.title: 11. Effective Date
privacy.section2.content:
2.1 Information Provided by You

  • Registration data: username, company name, email address, etc.
  • Configuration data: API keys, provider settings, model parameters, etc.
  • Usage data: questions you submit, feedback you provide, etc.
  • Contact data: information shared via support channels.

2.2 Information Collected Automatically

  • Device details: device type, operating system, browser version, etc.
  • Usage logs: access time, frequency, feature preferences, etc.
  • Technical data: IP address, cookies, session identifiers, etc.
privacy.section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacy.section3.content:
We use the collected information for the following purposes:

  • Service delivery: provide intelligent Q&A, knowledge-base search, and related features.
  • Service improvement: analyze usage data to optimize functionality and experience.
  • Security: detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security threats.
  • Customer support: respond to inquiries, complaints, and suggestions.
  • Legal compliance: fulfill obligations required by applicable laws and regulations.
privacy.section3.title: 3. How We Use Information
privacy.section4.content:
We may share information under the following circumstances:

  • With your explicit consent
  • Service partners: trusted vendors who help us operate the Service (e.g., cloud providers)
  • Legal requirements: when required by law, court order, or government request
  • Protection of rights: to safeguard the lawful rights, property, or safety of our users or the public
  • Business transfers: during mergers, acquisitions, or asset transfers
privacy.section4.highlight: Our Commitment: We will never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
privacy.section5.content:
5.1 Storage Location

Your personal information is primarily stored on servers located in China. For cross-border transfers, we will ensure compliance with applicable laws.

5.2 Security Measures

  • Encrypt data transmission and storage using industry-standard methods.
  • Implement strict access control and authentication.
  • Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability scans.
  • Provide privacy and security training to employees.
  • Maintain an incident response plan.

5.3 Data Retention

We retain personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Policy, unless otherwise required by law or with your consent.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
privacy.section6.content:
You are entitled to the following rights under applicable laws:

  • Access: learn how we collect and use your information.
  • Rectification: request corrections to inaccurate information.
  • Erasure: request deletion of your personal information.
  • Withdrawal: withdraw consent you previously provided.
  • Portability: obtain a copy of your personal data.
  • Complaint: lodge a complaint with relevant regulators.

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details provided in Section 10.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.section7.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:

  • Remember your preferences.
  • Deliver personalized experiences.
  • Analyze service usage.
  • Ensure service security.

You can manage cookies via your browser settings, though some features may not function properly.
privacy.section7.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacy.section8.content:
Our services are intended for adults. If you are a minor, please use the Service under the guidance of a guardian.

If we discover that minor information has been collected, we will delete it promptly.
privacy.section8.title: 8. Protection of Minors
privacy.section9.content:
We may update this Policy from time to time. Updated versions will be posted within the Service, and significant changes will be communicated via email or other methods.

We encourage you to review the Policy regularly to understand how we protect your data.
privacy.section9.title: 9. Updates to this Policy

guide.meta.title: BIC-QA Quick Start Guide
guide.header.title: BIC-QA Quick Start Guide
guide.header.subtitle: Complete the setup in four steps and start asking questions with knowledge base search right away.
guide.step1.title: Configure Base Models (including local Ollama)
guide.step1.item1: Open the extension Settings page and switch to Models & Providers.
guide.step1.item2: Add providers (e.g., local, Suzhou) and fill in the corresponding API Endpoint and API Key when required.
guide.step1.item3: For local Ollama, set the API Endpoint to http://localhost:11434/v1 (or your Ollama address).
guide.step1.item4: Click Test; the system will discover deployed models. Select the ones you need and Bulk Manage to save.
guide.step1.item5: After saving, the home page dropdown lets you choose by Model Name (Provider) to avoid duplicate names.
guide.step1.hint:
Models with identical names are distinguished as ‚ÄúModel Name (Provider)‚Äù, e.g., deepseek-r1:8b (local) and deepseek-r1:8b (Suzhou).

For local deployments with limited GPUs, consider using QWEN3:8B.
guide.step2.title: Register to obtain keys and knowledge base URLs, then save them
guide.step2.item1: Register on the enterprise knowledge base service or contact an admin to obtain the API Key and Knowledge Service URL (usually like .../knowledge).
guide.step2.item2: On the extension Settings page, fill in the Default Service URL and API Key under Knowledge Service.
guide.step2.item3: Click Save. Once saved, the knowledge dropdown and streaming channel will use this service.
guide.step2.note: We recommend configuring a valid API Key and Default URL under Knowledge Service first; the system prefers that credential pair.
guide.step2.hint: Forgot the key? Registered users can contact the platform admin or retrieve it via the registered email and service URL.
guide.step3.title: Enable the knowledge base Q&A service
guide.step3.item1: Select a configured Model (Provider) on the home page.
guide.step3.item2: Choose the desired knowledge base from the Knowledge Base dropdown (or keep ‚ÄúNo Knowledge Base‚Äù).
guide.step3.item3: Enter your question and click Send (or press Enter). The system combines retrieval with the model to answer.
guide.step3.item4: Responses stream in real time; you can Stop anytime and copy or export the result.
guide.step3.hint: When knowledge bases are enabled, the latest configuration is loaded automatically, prioritizing the Knowledge Service URL and API Key.
guide.step4.title: Configure parameters (prompt / temperature / similarity / topN)
guide.step4.item1: Choose a Parameter Rule on the home page or Settings; three built-in templates are ready to use.
guide.step4.item2: Customize Prompt, Temperature, Similarity, topN, and more as needed.
guide.step4.item3: After saving, select the rule when asking questions to apply it.
guide.step4.note: Parameter rules directly affect recall and generation: higher temperature increases creativity; similarity/topN adjust retrieval scope and count.
guide.step5.title: Import and export configurations
guide.step5.item1: On the extension Settings page, click Import or Export.
guide.step5.item2: Choose a JSON file to import, or export to a JSON file.
guide.step5.item3: During import, configurations are merged and you‚Äôll be prompted before overwriting duplicates.
guide.step5.item4: Export generates a JSON file containing the current configuration.
guide.step5.hint: Export regularly to migrate settings across devices or environments.
guide.footer.note: Tip: If a request fails, confirm the model endpoint, knowledge base URL, and API key, and check network connectivity.
notice.meta.title: Important Notice - Domain Update
notice.header.title: Important Notice
notice.header.subtitle: Domain update announcement
notice.warning.title: Urgent Notice
notice.warning.body: To deliver better stability and performance, we are updating our domain. Please update your configuration promptly.
notice.domain.title: Domain change details
notice.domain.body: The new domain provides faster response and improved reliability.
notice.adjustments.title: What you need to do
notice.adjustments.list1: API endpoints: replace every API call from www.dbaiops.cn:37225 with www.dbaiops.cn
notice.contact.title: Contact information
notice.contact.body: If you encounter any issues during the changeover, please reach out:
notice.contact.address: Room 516, Tower E1, Yuanchengxin Building, No.12 Yumin Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
notice.footer.line1: © 2025 AI Chat Service. All rights reserved.
notice.footer.line2: Thank you for your continued trust and support.
userGuide.meta.title: BIC-QA User Guide
userGuide.header.title: BIC-QA User Guide
userGuide.header.subtitle: Baisheng Intelligence - Intelligent Q&A Assistant
userGuide.introduction.title: üìñ Introduction
userGuide.introduction.aboutBicQa.title: About BIC-QA
userGuide.introduction.aboutBicQa.conten: BIC-QA (Business Intelligence & Knowledge Query Assistant) is an intelligent Q&A system designed for enterprise-level database knowledge management. As a new-generation database knowledge retrieval solution, BIC-QA is committed to providing efficient and accurate knowledge query services for database administrators, developers, and operations engineers.
userGuide.introduction.corePositioning.c: BIC-QA is a comprehensive database knowledge Q&A platform that supports all mainstream database systems, with deep optimization specifically for the domestic database ecosystem. The system integrates rich database knowledge bases covering SQL syntax, performance optimization, fault diagnosis, best practices, and other comprehensive content, providing users with professional database technical support that answers questions immediately.
userGuide.introduction.technicalAdvantag: Intelligent Semantic Understanding: Based on advanced NLP technology, accurately understands user query intent
Knowledge Graph Construction: Builds a complete database knowledge association network to provide contextually relevant answers
Real-time Knowledge Updates: Continuously updates database version features and best practices
Multi-dimensional Retrieval: Supports precise retrieval by database type, problem type, technical field, and other multi-dimensional aspects
userGuide.footer.tagline: BIC-QA Intelligent Q&A Assistant - Making knowledge retrieval smarter and Q&A more efficient
userGuide.footer.version: Version: v1.1 | Update Date: November 2025 | Baisheng Intelligence
userGuide.configuration.step1.warning.co: : Do not modify the default registration service URL arbitrarily, as it may affect the normal operation of the extension. If you have modified it, please reset the settings to restore the default value.
userGuide.configuration.step2.title: Step 2: Knowledge Base Service Configuration
userGuide.configuration.step2.step1: Find the "Knowledge Base Service Configuration" section on the settings page
userGuide.configuration.step2.step2: Enter the API Key received in the registration email into the "API Key" field
userGuide.configuration.step2.step3: Confirm that the "Service URL" is the default value (usually no modification needed)
userGuide.configuration.step2.step5: You can click "Test Connection" to verify that the configuration is correct
userGuide.configuration.step3.title: Step 3: AI Model Configuration
userGuide.configuration.step3.section1.s: Find the "Large Model Interface Configuration" section on the settings page
Provider Type: Select or customize the provider type (e.g., ollama, deepseek, etc.)
Provider Name: Enter the provider name (e.g., OpenAI, Baidu Wenxin, Alibaba Tongyi, etc.)
API Address: Fill in the API interface address
API Key: Fill in the API Key (if required)
Authentication Type: Select the authentication method (Bearer Token, API Key, or Custom)
Request Format: Select the request format (OpenAI format, Claude format, or Custom format)
userGuide.configuration.step4.descriptio: In the "Knowledge Base Parameter Rules Configuration" section on the settings page, you can:
userGuide.configuration.step4.item2: Set similarity threshold (0-1, higher values mean more precise matching)
userGuide.configuration.step4.item3: Set TOP N (1-10, returns the N most relevant results)
userGuide.configuration.step4.item4: Set temperature parameter (0-2, controls the creativity of responses)
userGuide.configuration.step4.warning.co: : Higher temperature increases creativity, similarity/TOP N affects the scope and quantity of knowledge base retrieval.
userGuide.usage.title: üéØ Usage Instructions
userGuide.usage.modes.title: Usage Modes
userGuide.usage.modes.popup.title: Popup Mode
userGuide.usage.modes.popup.content: Click the BIC-QA icon in the browser toolbar to open a small popup window with basic Q&A functionality. Suitable for quick questions and simple conversations.
userGuide.usage.modes.fullpage.title: Full Page Mode
userGuide.usage.modes.fullpage.content: Click the "üñ•Ô∏è Full Page" button in the top right corner of the popup to open the complete BIC-QA interface in a new tab, providing more workspace and more features. Suitable for complex conversations and extended use.
userGuide.usage.basicQa.title: Basic Q&A Operations
userGuide.installation.title: üöÄ Installation Guide
userGuide.installation.steps.title: Installation Steps
userGuide.installation.steps.step1.title: Step 1: Download Extension Files
userGuide.installation.steps.step1.conte: Download the BIC-QA extension package (BIC-QA_v1.1.zip) from the official website or GitHub
userGuide.installation.steps.step2.title: Step 2: Extract Files
userGuide.installation.steps.step2.conte: Extract the downloaded package to a local directory, ensuring the folder structure is complete
userGuide.installation.steps.step3.title: Step 3: Open Browser Extension Management Page
userGuide.installation.steps.step3.chrom: Chrome: Enter chrome://extensions/ in the address bar or via menu: More Tools ‚Üí Extensions
userGuide.installation.steps.step3.edge: Edge: Enter edge://extensions/ in the address bar or via menu: Extensions
userGuide.installation.steps.step4.title: Step 4: Enable Developer Mode
userGuide.installation.steps.step4.conte: In the top right corner of the extension management page, turn on the "Developer Mode" switch
userGuide.installation.steps.step5.title: Step 5: Load Extension
userGuide.installation.steps.step5.conte: Click the "Load unpacked extension" button and select the extracted BIC-QA_v1.1 folder
userGuide.installation.steps.step5.warni: : The selected folder must contain the manifest.json file. Please ensure you select the innermost plugin folder, not the outer package folder.
userGuide.installation.steps.step6.title: Step 6: Verify Installation
userGuide.installation.steps.step6.conte: After successful installation, the BIC-QA icon will appear in the browser toolbar. Click the icon to open the plugin interface.
userGuide.configuration.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration Guide
userGuide.configuration.intro: First-time use of BIC-QA requires four-step configuration. Once completed, you can start using it.
userGuide.configuration.step1.title: Step 1: User Registration
userGuide.configuration.step1.step1: Click the BIC-QA icon in the browser toolbar
userGuide.configuration.step1.step2: Click the "‚öôÔ∏è Settings" button in the top right corner
userGuide.configuration.step1.step3: Find the "User Registration" section on the settings page
userGuide.configuration.step1.step5: Check the box to agree to the user agreement and privacy policy
userGuide.configuration.step1.step7: Check your email to get the API Key
userGuide.configuration.step3.section1.e:
API Address: http://localhost:11434/v1
Authentication Type: Bearer Token (usually local Ollama does not require API Key)
userGuide.configuration.step3.section2.s: In the provider configuration, click the "Test" button to connect to the service
The system will automatically discover available models under this provider
Check the models you want to use in the model list
Click "Batch Management" to save model configuration
userGuide.configuration.step3.section2.h: : The homepage dropdown menu will display the format "Model Name (Provider)" to avoid confusion with models of the same name.
userGuide.configuration.step3.section3.i: For providers that do not support auto-discovery, you can manually add models:
userGuide.configuration.step3.section3.s: Find the "Model Configuration" section on the settings page
Model Name: Enter the model name (e.g., gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4, etc.)
Max Tokens: Set the maximum token limit for the model
Temperature Parameter: Set the temperature value (0-2, controls the creativity of responses)
Set as Default Model: Check this to set this model as the default model
userGuide.configuration.step4.title: Step 4: Parameter Rules Configuration (Optional)
userGuide.configuration.step4.intro: BIC-QA supports custom prompts and retrieval parameters, providing three preset modes:
userGuide.configuration.step4.table.head: Mode
Temperature
Similarity
Applicable Scenario
userGuide.usage.basicQa.step1: Select the configured Model (Provider) on the homepage
userGuide.usage.basicQa.step2: Select the target knowledge base from the Knowledge Base dropdown menu (optional, select "Do not use knowledge base" to use only the AI model)
userGuide.usage.basicQa.step3: Select Parameter Rules (optional, use default rules or custom rules)
userGuide.usage.basicQa.step4: Enter your question in the input box
userGuide.usage.basicQa.step5: Click the Send button or press Enter to submit the question
userGuide.usage.basicQa.step6: Wait for AI to generate the answer (supports streaming output, real-time display)
userGuide.usage.basicQa.tip.title: üí° Usage Tips
userGuide.usage.basicQa.tip.content: : After enabling the knowledge base, the system will automatically load the latest configuration and prioritize using the knowledge base service.
userGuide.usage.quickActions.title: Quick Actions
Click the "Start New Session" button in the left sidebar to start a completely new conversation and clear the current conversation history.
userGuide.usage.quickActions.history.con: Click the "History" button to view and manage all historical conversation records, supporting search, export, and deletion.
userGuide.usage.quickActions.awr.title: üìä AWR Analysis
userGuide.usage.quickActions.awr.content: Click the "AWR Analysis" button to upload Oracle AWR reports for analysis and obtain professional performance diagnostic reports.
userGuide.usage.quickActions.help.title: ‚ùì User Guide
userGuide.usage.quickActions.help.conten: Click the "User Guide" button to view detailed help documentation and usage instructions.
userGuide.usage.quickActions.announcemen: Click the "Announcements" button to view the latest product announcements and update information.
userGuide.usage.resultOperations.title: Result Operations
userGuide.usage.resultOperations.export: üì• Export HTML: Export conversation content as formatted HTML file
userGuide.usage.resultOperations.copy: üìã Copy: Quickly copy answer content to clipboard
userGuide.usage.resultOperations.like: üëç Like: Give positive feedback on the answer to help optimize the system
userGuide.usage.resultOperations.dislike: üëé Dislike: Give negative feedback on the answer to help improve the system
userGuide.usage.resultOperations.stop: ‚èπÔ∏è Stop Generation: During AI answer generation, you can click the stop button at any time to interrupt generation
userGuide.usage.multiLanguage.title: Multi-language Support
userGuide.usage.multiLanguage.intro: BIC-QA supports multi-language interface. You can select from the language selector in the top right corner:
userGuide.usage.multiLanguage.note: After selecting a language, the interface will immediately switch to the corresponding language.
userGuide.features.title: üîß Feature Details
userGuide.features.intelligentQa.title: Intelligent Q&A Function
userGuide.features.intelligentQa.multiMo: BIC-QA supports integration with various AI models, including:
Other models compatible with OpenAI API format
userGuide.features.intelligentQa.streami: Supports real-time streaming display of AI answers, allowing you to see content without waiting for the complete answer to be generated, improving user experience.
userGuide.features.intelligentQa.convers: Automatically saves conversation history, supports one-click clearing and exporting conversation records for easy management and review.
userGuide.features.knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base Retrieval Function
userGuide.features.knowledgeBase.enterpr: Enterprise Integration: Seamlessly connect to enterprise knowledge base systems
userGuide.features.knowledgeBase.matchin: Intelligent Matching: Precise content retrieval based on semantic similarity
userGuide.features.knowledgeBase.multiLi: Multi-library Support: Manage multiple knowledge bases simultaneously
userGuide.features.knowledgeBase.optimiz: Result Optimization: Intelligent sorting and relevance filtering
userGuide.features.awr.title: AWR Report Analysis Function
userGuide.features.awr.overview.title: Feature Overview
userGuide.features.awr.overview.content: BIC-QA provides powerful Oracle database AWR (Automatic Workload Repository) report analysis functionality, helping database administrators quickly diagnose database performance issues and obtain professional analysis reports and optimization recommendations.
userGuide.features.awr.mainFeatures.pars: Intelligent Parsing: Automatically parses Oracle AWR report HTML format files
userGuide.features.awr.mainFeatures.anal: Deep Analysis: Comprehensive performance issue diagnosis based on AI large models
userGuide.features.awr.mainFeatures.repo: Professional Reports: Generates structured analysis reports including problem diagnosis and optimization recommendations
userGuide.features.awr.mainFeatures.mult: Multi-language Support: Supports Chinese and English analysis reports
userGuide.features.awr.mainFeatures.hist: History Management: View and manage historical analysis records, supports re-analysis
userGuide.features.awr.version.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Version Notice
userGuide.features.awr.version.content: : The AWR report analysis function is currently in Beta testing. We sincerely invite you to provide valuable comments and suggestions during use.
userGuide.features.awr.steps.title: Usage Steps
userGuide.features.awr.steps.step1: Click the "üìä AWR Analysis" button in the left navigation bar
userGuide.features.awr.steps.step2.label: In the "New Analysis" tab:
userGuide.features.awr.steps.step2.item2: Fill in system problem overview (optional, recommended to fill in a clear problem description)
userGuide.features.awr.steps.step2.item6: Check the box to agree to the disclaimer and security statement
userGuide.features.awr.steps.step3: Click the "Execute Analysis" button to submit the task
userGuide.features.awr.steps.step4: View analysis progress and results in the "History" tab
userGuide.features.awr.steps.step5: After analysis is complete, the report will be sent to the email you filled in
userGuide.features.awr.datasource.title: üìã AWR Report Analysis Data Source Tips
userGuide.features.awr.datasource.suppor: ‚úÖ Supported: AWR reports for Oracle single-instance databases
userGuide.features.awr.datasource.rac: ‚úÖ RAC Recommendation: For RAC environments, please use awrrpt.sql or awrrpti.sql to generate reports
userGuide.features.awr.datasource.unsupp: ‚ùå Not Currently Supported: AWR comparison reports generated by awrddrpi.sql and global reports generated by awrgrpt.sql
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.int: The AWR analysis report generated by the system usually contains the following content:
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.ove: Report Overview: Basic information such as database version and report time range
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.loa: Load Overview: Analysis of overall database load
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.met: Performance Metrics: Detailed analysis of key performance indicators (such as hit rate, wait events, etc.)
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.dia: Problem Diagnosis: Identified potential performance issues and bottlenecks
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.opt: Optimization Recommendations: Specific optimization recommendations and solutions for discovered problems
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.sql: SQL Analysis: Analysis and optimization recommendations for high-load SQL statements
userGuide.features.awr.reportContent.eve: Wait Event Analysis: Detailed analysis and handling recommendations for wait events
userGuide.features.history.title: History Management
userGuide.features.history.search: Supports searching historical records by time and keywords
userGuide.features.history.export: Supports exporting historical records in HTML format
userGuide.features.history.delete: Supports batch deletion of historical records
userGuide.features.history.reload: Supports reloading historical conversations to continue asking questions
userGuide.troubleshooting.title: üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting
userGuide.troubleshooting.commonIssues.i: Browser did not select the innermost folder when selecting the extension
Re-download and extract the extension files
Ensure the selected folder contains the manifest.json file
Select the innermost plugin folder (BIC-QA_v1.1), not the outer package folder
Check if the service address is correct:

# Check local Ollama service
curl http://localhost:11434/v1/models

# Verify network connection
ping your-api-endpoint.com
Verify if the API Key is correct
For local Ollama, configure system environment variables:
Check firewall settings to ensure extension access is allowed
If the model does not exist, use ollama pull <model-name> to download the model
Click "Test Connection" on the settings page to verify configuration
userGuide.troubleshooting.debugSteps.met: Press F12 to open developer tools
Confirm all required fields are filled
Verify API address and key format
userGuide.support.title: üìû Technical Support
userGuide.support.getHelp.title: Get Help
userGuide.support.getHelp.email.title: üìß Technical Support Email
userGuide.support.getHelp.email.content: If you have technical questions or usage inquiries, please send an email to the technical support email, and we will reply within 24 hours.
userGuide.support.getHelp.website.title: üåê Official Website
userGuide.support.getHelp.website.conten: Visit the official website to get the latest product information and documentation.
userGuide.support.getHelp.community.cont: Scan the QR code to follow the DBAIOps Community WeChat official account to get the latest news and technical support.
userGuide.support.getHelp.feedback.title: üêõ Issue Feedback
userGuide.support.getHelp.feedback.conte: Scan the QR code to join the BIC-QA WeChat Assistant discussion group, or visit the code repository: Gitee / GitHub, submit an Issue to report bugs or suggest features.
userGuide.support.contact.title: Contact Information
userGuide.support.contact.address: Company Address: Room 516, Building E1, Yuanchenxin Building, No. 12 Yumin Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing
userGuide.support.updateLog.title: Update Log
userGuide.support.updateLog.history.v108: v1.0.8.2: Added multi-language support, fixed known bugs
userGuide.support.updateLog.history.v107: v1.0.7: Added AWR report analysis function, supports Oracle database performance diagnosis
userGuide.support.updateLog.history.v106: v1.0.6: Support for adding large model providers, fixed known issues
userGuide.privacy.title: üîí Privacy & Security
userGuide.privacy.dataProtection.title: Data Protection
userGuide.privacy.dataProtection.localSt: Conversation history is stored locally in the browser and will not be uploaded to the server.
userGuide.privacy.dataProtection.encrypt: All network requests use HTTPS encrypted transmission to ensure data security.
userGuide.privacy.dataProtection.permiss: Minimize permission requirements, only request necessary browser permissions.
userGuide.privacy.securityFeatures.title: Security Features
userGuide.privacy.securityFeatures.local: Local Model: Supports completely local deployment, data does not leave the local environment
userGuide.privacy.securityFeatures.apiKe: API Key: Secure storage and transmission, will not be leaked to third parties
userGuide.privacy.securityFeatures.acces: Access Control: Configurable network access permissions to control data flow
userGuide.privacy.policy.title: Privacy Policy
userGuide.privacy.policy.item1: Do not collect personal sensitive information
userGuide.privacy.policy.item2: Do not share data with third parties
userGuide.privacy.policy.item4: For detailed privacy policy, please check the "Privacy Policy" page in the plugin
popup.onboarding.step1.title: Welcome to BIC-QA
popup.onboarding.step1.description: If you are an existing user, please enter your API key to enter; if you are a new user, you can click Register
popup.onboarding.step1.testFirst: Please test the connection first to verify the API key is valid before entering
popup.onboarding.step1.registerDescripti: Please fill in the registration information. After successful registration, the API key will be sent to your email
popup.onboarding.step1.registerSuccess: Registration successful! API key has been sent to your email, please check
popup.onboarding.step1.validation.requir: Please fill in all required fields
popup.onboarding.step2.title: Configure API Key
popup.onboarding.step2.description: Please configure your API key to start using the intelligent Q&A feature
popup.onboarding.step2.validation.requir: Please fill in all required fields
popup.onboarding.completed: Configuration completed, you can start using now!
popup.onboarding.reminder.registration: Please complete registration to access more features
popup.onboarding.reminder.apiKey: Please configure API key to start using intelligent Q&A
